findings.title: F-2023-0310 - Floating Pragma - Info
findings.description: Using a floating pragma statement without specifying a fixed compiler version can lead to compatibility and stability issues due to potential breaking changes or unexpected behavior introduced in newer compiler versions.

findings.title: Centralized Token Minting
findings.description: All tokens are minted to a single address, making the security of the token supply dependent on the secureness of key storage.
